props.text: High Voltage Link Road Substation ied09A PF and Voltage

messageHandlers.script:
area = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
	headers = ['Value', 'Label']
	data = []
	data.append(['%', 'All'])
			
	if area != '%' and area != 'General':			
		tags = system.tag.browse(area, filter={'tagType':'UdtInstance', 'recursive':True, 'name':'Site Details'})

		if tags:
			tags = [tag['fullPath'] for tag in tags]
			paths = ['{}/Parameters/Site_Name'.format(tag) for tag in tags]
			vals = system.tag.readBlocking(paths)
			vals = [val.value for val in vals]
			vals = sorted(vals)
			
			for val in vals:
				data.append([val, val])
	datads = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, data)
	self.props.options = datads
	self.props.value = '%'

area = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
	headers = ['Value', 'Label']
	data = []
	data.append(['%', 'All'])
				
	if area != '%' and area != 'General':	
		tags = system.tag.browse(area, filter={'tagType':'UdtInstance', 'recursive':True, 'name':'Site Details'})
		
		if tags:
			tags = [tag['fullPath'] for tag in tags]
			paths = ['{}/Parameters/Site_Name'.format(tag) for tag in tags]
			vals = system.tag.readBlocking(paths)
			vals = [val.value for val in vals]
			vals = sorted(vals)
		
			for val in vals:
				data.append([val, val])
	datads = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, data)
	self.props.options = datads

config.script:
import traceback
	
	try:
		id = self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").props.selection.data[0].id
		params = {'id':id} 
		
		query = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(system.db.runNamedQuery('trends/loadTrend', params))
		system.perspective.print(query)
		configName = query[0]['area'] + ' '  + query[0]['site'] + ' ' + query[0]['trendname']
		
		powerChartJSON = system.util.jsonDecode(query[0]['powerChartPropsJSON'])
		
		chartProps = ['config', 'interaction', 'axes', 'pens', 'plots', 'dataColumns', 'title', 'timeAxis', 'legend', 'style']	 
		
		# explicitly assign only properties that are needed for chart
		newProps = {}
		for prop in chartProps:
			newProps[prop] = powerChartJSON[prop]
					
#		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props = newProps
		self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Label").props.text = configName
		
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.config = newProps['config']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.interaction = newProps['interaction']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.axes = newProps['axes']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.pens = newProps['pens']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.dataColumns= newProps['dataColumns']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.title = newProps['title']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.timeAxis = newProps['timeAxis']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.legend= newProps['legend']
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("powerChart").getChild("PowerChart").props.style = newProps['style']
		
	except:
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())
